title: Praise the Lord Who Reigns Above

lyrics.text:
Celebrate th' eternal God with harp and psaltery, timbrels soft and cymbals loud in this high praise agree;
praise with every tuneful string; all the reach of heavenly art, all the powers of music bring, the music of the heart.

God, in whom they move and live, let every creature sing, glory to their Maker give, and homage to their King.
Hallowed be thy name beneath, as in heaven on earth adored; praise the Lord in every breath, let all things praise the Lord.

author: Charles Wesley (1743)
